coreAttributes.name: clover clamps
coreAttributes.description: A pair of metal clover clamps designed to tightly pinch onto the wearer's skin. The attached weights pull down to apply a constant, painful pressure.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(give)] [npc2.namePos] clover clamps a rough tug before removing them from [npc2.her] [npc2.nipples+].

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(affix)] the clover clamps to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples+] before giving them a sharp tug.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] carefully [npc.verb(remove)] the clover clamps from [npc.her] [npc.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc.vagina] lips.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] carefully [npc.verb(remove)] the clover clamps from [npc2.namePos] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(give)] [npc2.namePos] clover clamps a rough tug before removing them from [npc2.her] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wince)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(affix)] the clover clamps on [npc.her] [npc.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc.vagina] lips.
replacementText.other: [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(wince)] as [npc.name] [npc.verb(affix)] the clover clamps on [npc2.her] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(affix)] the clover clamps to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips before giving them a sharp tug.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wince)] as the clover clamps bite into [npc.her] [npc.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc.vagina].
replacementText.other: [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(wince)] as the clover clamps bite into [npc.her] [npc.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc.vagina].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(yelp)] as [npc.name] [npc.verb(tug)] the clover clamps on [npc2.her] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] before letting them hang free.
